players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "Diana, who did you investigate last night?"
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be the mafia. Bob, what did you investigate?"
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be the mafia. Bob, you should vote him."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "I agree with Diana, Charlie is mafia. Vote him."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Bob: "Diana, who did you investigate last night?"
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be the mafia. Bob, what did you investigate?"
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be the mafia. Bob, you should vote him."
You: remained silent.
Bob: "I agree with Diana, Charlie is mafia. Vote him."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
Bob: "Diana, who did you investigate last night?"
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be the mafia. Bob, what did you investigate?"
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be the mafia. Bob, you should vote him."
Charlie: remained silent.
Bob: "I agree with Diana, Charlie is mafia. Vote him."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
